com.informatica.mdm.bpm.interfaces

Interface IBPMAdapter


  • public interface IBPMAdapter
    Defines the common behavior that must be supported by BPM adapters in order to communicate with a BPM engine. It provides the basic functionality to create and manipulate tasks.

    IDD can use adapters implementing this interface to provide workflow capabilities. The application context that is passed to the BPM adapters is an instance of IDDApplicationContext and the task data is of type IDDTaskData.

    See Also:
    IDDApplicationContext, IDDTaskData, ITaskFilter, ISortCriteria, ITaskData

    • Method Detail

      • initialize

        void initialize(Properties properties)
         throws BPMAdapterException
        Initialize the BPM adapter with the specified properties. Any additional properties or resources can be loaded or initialized here.
        Parameters:
        properties - properties used for initializing the BPM engine. For IDD, the parameters listed in BPMEnginePropertiesEnum are passed to the initialize method.
        Throws:
        BPMAdapterException

      • getById

        ITaskData getById(IApplicationContext appContext,
                  String taskId)
           throws BPMAdapterException
        Retrieve a task based on the specified ID.
        Parameters:
        appContext - the application-specific context
        taskId - the task identifier
        Returns:
        the task details for the specified ID
        Throws:
        BPMAdapterException

      • getTasks

        ITaskDataPager getTasks(IApplicationContext appContext,
                        List<ITaskFilter> taskFilterList,
                        List<ISortCriteria> sortOrderList,
                        int recordsToReturn)
                 throws BPMAdapterException
        Retrieve tasks based on the filter criteria specified in the task filters. The sort criteria is applied on the list of tasks to be retrieved.
        Parameters:
        appContext - the application-specific context
        taskFilterList - the filter criteria to be applied when retrieving tasks
        sortOrderList - the sort criteria to be applied
        recordsToReturn - the number of records to return
        Returns:
        a data pager that returns a list of tasks
        Throws:
        BPMAdapterException

      • getTaskLineage

        ITaskDataPager getTaskLineage(IApplicationContext appContext,
                              List<ITaskFilter> taskFilterList,
                              List<ITaskFilter> processFilterList,
                              List<ISortCriteria> sortOrderList,
                              int recordsToReturn)
                       throws BPMAdapterException
        Retrieve the task lineage based on the filter criteria for the tasks. This method should be implemented by any adapter that wants to support retrieving task lineage. If task lineage is not supported, this method should throw an exception.
        Parameters:
        appContext - the application-specific context
        taskFilterList - list of filter criteria for task parameters
        processFilterList - list of filter criteria for process parameters
        sortOrderList - the sort criteria to be applied
        recordsToReturn - the number of records to return
        Returns:
        a data pager that returns a list of tasks
        Throws:
        BPMAdapterException

      • create

        void create(IApplicationContext appContext,
            ITaskData taskData)
     throws BPMAdapterException
        Creates an instance of a business process based on the task data and the application context.
        Parameters:
        appContext - the application-specific context
        taskData - the task details that will be used to create a process instance
        Throws:
        BPMAdapterException

      • update

        void update(IApplicationContext appContext,
            ITaskData taskData)
     throws BPMAdapterException
        Updates an instance of a business process with the given task data and the application context.
        Parameters:
        appContext - the application-specific context
        taskData - the task details that will be used to update an existing instance of the business process
        Throws:
        BPMAdapterException

      • claimTask

        void claimTask(IApplicationContext appContext,
               ITaskData taskData)
        throws BPMAdapterException
        Assign the task to a user. In IDD, the user to whom the task will be assigned to is available in the calling application context.
        Parameters:
        appContext - the application-specific context
        taskData - the task details that will be used in this operation
        Throws:
        BPMAdapterException

      • mergeComplete

        void mergeComplete(IApplicationContext appContext,
                   ITaskData taskData)
            throws BPMAdapterException
        This method is specific to IDD and is called whenever a merge operation takes place within a task context. It is used to perform any cleanup on the active process instance.
        Parameters:
        appContext - the application-specific context
        taskData - the task details that will be used in this operation
        Throws:
        BPMAdapterException

      • executeAction

        void executeAction(IApplicationContext appContext,
                   ITaskData taskData,
                   String taskAction)
            throws BPMAdapterException
        Executes an action on a task.
        Parameters:
        appContext - the application-specific context
        taskData - the task details that will be used in this operation
        taskAction - the action to be taken on the task
        Throws:
        BPMAdapterException

      • getTaskTypePrivilege

        IPrivilege getTaskTypePrivilege(IApplicationContext appContext,
                                String taskType)
                         throws BPMAdapterException
        Retrieve privileges on a task type given the application context.
        Parameters:
        appContext - the application-specific context
        taskType - the task type
        Returns:
        The privileges on the task type for the user
        Throws:
        BPMAdapterException

      • doesSupportLineage

        boolean doesSupportLineage(IApplicationContext appContext)
                    throws BPMAdapterException
        Checks to see if task lineage is supported by the adapter.
        Parameters:
        appContext - the application-specific context
        Returns:
        true if Task Lineage is supported by the adapter, false otherwise.
        Throws:
        BPMAdapterException

      • doesSupportAdministration

        boolean doesSupportAdministration(IApplicationContext appContext)
                           throws BPMAdapterException
        Checks to see if task administration is supported by the adapter.
        Parameters:
        appContext - the application-specific context
        Returns:
        true if Task Administration is supported by the adapter, false otherwise.
        Throws:
        BPMAdapterException

      • isUserAllowedToOpenTask

        boolean isUserAllowedToOpenTask(IApplicationContext appContext,
                                String taskId)
                         throws BPMAdapterException
        Returns true if a user has sufficient privileges to view the specified task. In IDD, the user for this operation will be available in the calling application context.
        Parameters:
        appContext - the application-specific context
        taskId - the task identifier
        Returns:
        true if the user is allowed to view the task
        Throws:
        BPMAdapterException

      • getTaskType

        ITaskType getTaskType(IApplicationContext appContext,
                      ITaskData taskData)
               throws BPMAdapterException
        Returns task type details for given task.
        Parameters:
        taskData - the task instance
        Returns:
        task type information such as list of actions, display type, etc.
        Throws:
        BPMAdapterException

      • getNextTaskType

        ITaskType getNextTaskType(ITaskType taskType,
                          String taskActionName)
                   throws BPMAdapterException
        Returns next task type in a workflow based on current type and action.
        Parameters:
        taskType - initial task type
        taskActionName - task action name
        Returns:
        task type following after given action.
        Throws:
        BPMAdapterException

      • doesSupportAttachments

        boolean doesSupportAttachments(IApplicationContext appContext)
                        throws BPMAdapterException
        Returns:
        true if BPM implementation supports attachment related methods
        Throws:
        BPMAdapterException
